definition.name: Close Issue
definition.description: A GitHub action to close an issue
definition.author: peter-evans

inputs.name: repository
inputs.description: The GitHub repository containing the issue

inputs.name: issue-number
inputs.description: The number of the issue to close

inputs.name: close-reason
inputs.description: Reason for closing the issue, "completed" or "not_planned"

inputs.name: comment
inputs.description: A comment to make on the issue before closing

inputs.name: labels
inputs.description: A comma or newline separated list of labels.
